description:
The US / DOE Office of Nuclear Smuggling Detection and Deterrence (NSDD) Knowledge Management Mobile App will
provide password-protected direct access to non-sensitive information regarding the operations, maintenance, and
sustainability of deployed radiation detection systems. This Mobile App will serve content managed on the NSDD
Knowledge Management Website to users in a more user-friendly manner. The Mobile App will be cross-platform,
functioning for both iOS and Android devices. The Mobile App will operate both with and without a network connection,
provide access to KMW content based on the users' interests, and strengthen analysis of NSDD's training effectiveness.
name: NSDD Knowledge Management Mobile App

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
